text: The Museum of Fine Arts, Boston (often abbreviated as MFA Boston or MFA) is an art museum in Boston, Massachusetts, United States. The museum has 500,000 objects from prehistoric times to the present. The museum was first opened in 1870. In 1909 the collection was moved to 465 Huntington Avenue in Boston. == Gallery == ==References== Category:Art museums in the United States Category:Boston
title: Museum of Fine Arts, Boston
